name: Run To The Anthills
description:
Help Gary, Billy, Molly and Teddy to find their way back to the anthill. This game is based on Langton's ant with the addition of obstacles and special blocks. I hope you will have fun playing this, any feedback is welcome.

Thank you for playing!

Controls:

WASD (arrow keys): Move the cursor on the map or on the UI / Change the game speed / Move the cursor over a playable ant .

Q (A Button): Change the tile type / Select another playable ant.

E (B button): Leave the UI mode.

Escape (start): Pause / Unpause the game.

Space bar (select): Switch between game mode and UI mode.
